modules.name: T7-CTRL
modules.description: Controller for patching cables. Part of the T7-series.

modules.name: T7-MIDI
modules.description: MIDI-expander for patching cables, sends commands to the controller-module. Part of the T7-series.

modules.name: T7-ASSISTANT
modules.description: Helper-module for identifying module IDs and port IDs when patching cables. Part of the T7-series.

modules.name: MX
modules.description: Module for controlling the mouse pointer and mouse clicks by CV, useful for MIDI-controllers.

modules.name: PM
modules.description: Provides a context menu on cable-ports

modules.name: AUDIO-EX-16
modules.description: Experimental module for non-blocking usage of multiple audio-devices in Rack v1. Do NOT use multiple ASIO devices the same time.
